reviews.review: Ну игра на разок, думать особо не надо, запускаете мираж и кайфуете, отличная игра для расслабона
if you like gay furry hentai, then this is your game.+

CS Step it up. match making has become unplayable almost. it seems valve has given up on csgo and the players. its over run by cheaters. servers are shit. for such a awesome game. but over the decades the forgot what and who matters. at least you can buy a piece of weapon artwork, that wont last. while valve lined their pockets
MUITO BOM ESSE JOGO ME LEVOU A CRESCER NA VIDA

Although it is fun from time to time, it is becoming more frustrating because I get penalized for being associated with a hacker, while I have made countless reports against legit hackers and wallers but they are still free to play in CSGO's official matchmaking servers. VAC ban is a joke that works only on freehacks but are completely powerless against paid hacks. I'm also certain they profit from the underground hacking community. Valve is just like any capitalistic companies - out to make a profit. They don't care about the integrity of their game.
mein krebs ist durch dieses spiel schlimmer geworden
Tirando os xiters, melhor game da valve

Hackers everywhere, people accusing people of hacking everywhere. Trust factor means that if you're better than someone and they report you, you get banished to hack vs hack lobbies until you buy a new account. This game is amazing. It will always be amazing. But VAC is garbage, and so is Valve.

Önceden oynamayı çok severdim ama zamanla hilelerden ve hoşumuza gitmeyen güncellemelerden bıkıp arkadaşlarımla birlikte bıraktım. Pişman değilim güzel zamanlar geçirdim ama bir efsane benim için öldü bir gün tekrar dirilir mi bilmiyorum.
Cheaters, cheaters everywhere. On high ranks it's even worse.
Its a chill game if u play it cleanly and for fun.
O jogo é muito bom. Tem um defeito: não consegue administrar no sentido de banir os hackers.

comp will occasionally have cheaters, war games as well, any reports don't get followed, the game overall has way too many bugs. War games you spawn and some one will kill you before you can move your mouse. Training maps are out of touch with the real game.
unless you make a career out of it than maybe in 40 years you will achieve a bit more than just a casual player. Community is EXTREMELY TOXIC. They make fun of you how trash you are to the point that the game is no longer enjoyable. Cheater prosper in this game.

Guess who are born cheaters? Yes, the Russians. Guess which game the Russians like the most? Yes, CS-GO. Cheats are constantly increasing in the game and nothing is done for it. It's getting worse and more unplayable every day.
